channel.title: [317] ranging help
channel.description:
ranging works fine apart from it dont range from a distant, when i click a monster it runs up close to it before ranging, any ideas?
edit: ok checked and it only does that with the magic longbow sighted! any fix for this?

item.title: [317] ranging help
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Locate the code for the magic longbows firing range then apply it to the magic longbow sighted. It’ll take you a bit of searching though cause personally I don’t know the code for making it range at a distance.

Read full topic
